name: Dinari SQ
description: The Dinari SQ dShares token (SQ.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in Block, Inc. (SQ), a leading financial technology company formerly known as Square. Block operates Square, a widely used payment processing platform for businesses, as well as Cash App, a popular peer-to-peer payment and investing platform. Additionally, Block is involved in Bitcoin development and decentralized finance (DeFi) innovation through its subsidiary TBD. Each SQ.d token is fully backed by a corresponding Block, Inc. stock share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, SQ.d provides investors with exposure to fintech, payments, and digital asset innovation, while benefiting from 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
